message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd find very valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $10,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to make this work.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit tight on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500?
